name: Cycho
description:
Cycho is Alfred Hitchcock meets Tron light cycles. Two players compete for survival as they maneuver on a giant moving eye. It might just be the weirdest multiplayer game of "snakes" you'll ever play. Eye think you should try it.

Watch a Trailer Video

Tron rules apply... don't hit yourself, the other player, or the edge of the box marking the arena. There is an instructions screen in the game.

Head-to-Head 2-Player or Asymmetric 3-Player

By using gamepads the two players can fight for control of the eye, or a third person can play as the eye and menace the two cycles. Xbox controllers are recommended.

Design and Programming: Zachstronaut
Music and Sound: Dan Knoflicek

Read a post about Cycho on zachstronaut.com.

No installer and DRM-Free!
